---
title: "Shiny in Quarto"
format: html
server: shiny
---

```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Simple Shiny App in Quarto"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("param", "Choose a parameter:", choices = c("a", "b", "c"))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      textOutput("selected_param")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$selected_param <- renderText({
    paste("You selected:", input$param)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
